definition[0]: the part of a nut or seed inside the shell, or the part inside the stone of some fruits
definition[1]: one of the small yellow pieces on a corn cob
definition[2]: the most important part of a statement, idea, plan etc
example[0]: This evidence is the kernel of the defendantsâ€™ case.
definition[3]: a very small part or amount of something
example[1]: There may be a kernel of truth in what he says.
